articles.title: 40% of the analysts tracking D-Mart expect stock to fall as much as 8-20% in the next 12 months - CNBCTV18
articles.description: 40 percent of the 25 analysts who track Avenue Supermarts have a sell recommendation on the stock, while 32 percent and 28 percent of those tracking the stock have a buy and hold rating respectively.
